charges.charge_disposition: REVOKED 6/11/2018: The defendant is committed to the BOP for term of 6 months as to Count 1s of the superseding Indictment with no further term of Supervised Release to follow. Defendant remanded to custody of USM.  ORIGINAL SENTENCE: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count 1 (lesser included offense) on 09/16/11 of the Superseding Indictment. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 60 Months. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons: At defendant's request, he be allowed to participate in the 500-hour intensive residential drug abuse treatment program while incarcerated; and the Court recommends defendant serve the period of incarceration at a facility as close to his home as possible. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years. Standard and additional conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $100.00. Fine waived. No restitution.
Dismissed on the motion of the United States

REVOCATION SENTENCE: THE DEFENDANT: admitted guilt to violation of standard and mandatory condition(s) of the term of supervision. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 12 Months and 1 Day. No Term of Supervised Release To Follow. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal.  ORIGINAL SENTENCE: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count 1 of the Information. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of TIME SERVED. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. Standard and additional conditions of release imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $100.00. Fine waived. No restitution.

charges.charge_description: Count 1: The defendant did knowingly conspire, confederate, and agree with Michael S. Rojas, Steven M. Martin, John O. Younce, a/k/a Dog, Jason Keeton, a/k/a Kegler, 2 a/k/a Smalls, Vernon Tennison, Jr., a/k/a Junior, co-conspirators not charged herein, and with others both  known and unknown, to distribute more than five-hundred (500) grams of a mixture and substance containing a  detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance, in violation of Title 21, United  States Code, Sections 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(viii) Count 2: The defendant did knowingly and intentionally, during and in relation to a drug-trafficking crime, to wit: the conspiracy to distribute methamphetamine alleged in  Count One, use a firearm, by shooting at and thereby wounding John Craig, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 2, and 924(c)(1)(A)(iii). All in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Section 846. Count 3: The defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess, with intent to distribute, some amount of a mixture and substance containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance, in violation of Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C).

charges.charge_disposition: REVOKED 4/28/16: Dft is committed to BOP for 7 mos with no further term of Supervised Release to follow. Dft advised of right to appeal. Dft remanded to custody of USM. ORIGINAL SENT: The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts 3 &; 6 of the Superseding Indictment. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 32 Months. Counts 3 and 6 - 32 months, each count, concurrent. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 6 years. Count 3 - 6 years; Count 6 - 3 years; concurrent. Standard and additional conditions of release imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $200.00 (Counts 3 and 6 - $100.00, each count). Fine waived. No restitution.

The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts 1 &; 2 on 01/04/12 of the Superseding Indictment. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 150 Months. Count 1 - 30 months; Count 2 - 120 months, consecutive to Count 1. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons: At defendant's request, he be allowed to participate in the 500-hour intensive residential drug abuse treatment program while incarcerated; and the Court recommends defendant serve the period of incarceration at the facility in Leavenworth, KS. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years. Counts 1 &; 2 - 5 years, each count, concurrent. Standard and additional conditions of supervised release imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $200.00, Counts 1 &; 2 - $100, each count. Fine waived. No restitution.
